about_the_game:
Greetings, heir of Rodovia. Are you ready to claim your rightful throne? If so, know this - ruling a fantasy kingdom is no easy feat. Welcome to the Crown of Greed Demo, a classic strategy game inspired by old-school traditions, featuring a unique indirect command system, so unusual among other strategy games. The demo version, being just a foretaste of the full version, will familiarize you with the main mechanics and features of the game.

Your first steps in Rodovia

The Demo version allows you to create and defend your very first foothold. Choose from a range of basic economic facilities, workshops, military buildings, and hero dwellings to secure the safety and well-being of your people. Surround your city with defensive towers and expand your borders to gain new territories and subjects.

Will they agree to serve you?

In the Demo version, you will be able to recruit and upgrade three basic hero classes. Heroes, endowed with free will, will gladly undertake your quests... or not! You can't force them to obey you, but you can try to buy their services with shiny coins. The rogue, hunter and warrior await your first offers. Will they agree to cooperate?

Realms inspired by European medieval folk culture await

Travel through the gloomy, mysterious lands of Rodovia to strengthen your rule. Discover a variety of the Demo version biomes, such as Forests, Deathlands, Swamps or Plains, each with their own locations and horrifying inhabitants. Visit forgotten ruins, caves, graveyards or dens and remember - with great risk comes great reward.

No more direct orders

Discover that authority extends beyond mere commands, and that a King's power is only as strong as his ability to bend others to his will. In this Demo version of the game, you can try out the unique, indirect management system, in which your subjects will decide for themselves when and which tasks they want to undertake. If you want them to obey you, you better get your gold ready!

- Demo based on a single, extensive scenario containing a good deal of mechanics, which you can find in the full version

- Unusual RTS gameplay with indirect management solutions

- Engaging Orders system, which may or may not influence your subjects and heroes

- Opportunity to build and expand your first fantasy foothold

- Dynamic Combat and Magic systems

- The majestic in-game world, inspired by European medieval folk culture and mythology

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 970 4GB or Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: In this Demo version of the game, you will set up your very first foothold and try to survive in the hostile realm of Rodovia. Bend your subjects to your will with an unusual indirect management system. Plan, build, manage and offer bounties to greedy heroes who may or may not take on the challenge.

English*, Polish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
